channel.title: I must be retarded another proberlem
channel.description: okay so im wanting to make my server public but im not sure how so far this is what ive done portforwarding - done no-ip set up/downloaded - done changed ip in client.java - not dont im not sure which ip i put is it the no-ip or my computers ip? thats all ive done so far what else is there to do im not wanting to use hamachi and do people need to download just my client file and run it then should be able to join?

item.title: I must be retarded another proberlem
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Hello,

For you to log into your server you need to connect by your local host.

Your local host in 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0.

For other people to connect they will need your no-ip.

You logging in = 127.0.0.1

Players logging in = nameofserver.no-ip.org.

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
item.source: I must be retarded another proberlem

item.title: I must be retarded another proberlem
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

okay, for client.java, put in your server ip, for example = examplescape.no-ip.org. and this should allow ppl to play it and if you want to play it, change the client.java to 0.0.00 or 127.0.0.1.
